questions.text: Which practice supports all three CIA objectives?

options.B: Encryption and secure systems for storage and transmission

questions.explanation: Encryption and secure systems protect confidentiality and integrity while supporting availability.

options.B: Access based on job role and least privilege

questions.explanation: Role‑based access grants only the permissions needed for responsibilities.

questions.text: A suspected PHI breach should be reported:
questions.explanation: Immediate reporting initiates timely investigation and containment.

questions.text: If fewer than 500 individuals are affected by a breach, notification to HHS must occur:

options.C: Within 60 days of the end of the calendar year

questions.explanation: Policy specifies the year‑end 60‑day window for <500 individuals.

questions.text: If 500 or more individuals are affected, notifications must be sent to:

options.B: Individuals, HHS, and media as appropriate within 60 days of discovery

questions.explanation: ≥500 triggers broader notice requirements within 60 days of discovery.
The policy calls for regular audits and annual training.
